sentences.sentence: It is now usual to revalue property assets on a more regular basis.
sentences.translation: 目前更经常地调高固定资产的价值是很平常的。

sentences.sentence: Countries enjoying surpluses will be under no pressure to revalue their currencies.
sentences.translation: 享有贸易顺差的国家将不会受到调高本国货币币值的压力。

sentences.sentence: We are always seeking ways to reduce and revalue our waste.
sentences.translation: 我们一直在寻求减少和重新评估废品的方法。
